description: Gratitude, kills every bad feeling, because you look back to the past and say,'Thank you God, if it weren't you I should have died!'

title: Contentment
description: Contentment is all, because when you are content with your life, you are always happy and you don't envy other people's success and covet their belongings

title: Depression
description: Depression is too much past. You wanting to change what happened in the past while you can not!
